title: Example: EU compute threshold + minimal RSP checklist (demo pack)
source_note: This is a demo 'policy pack' derived from public, high-level requirements (compute threshold + checklist-style commitments). It is not an official legal mapping.

compute_threshold.description: Prove training compute is below a public threshold without revealing actual compute.

required_evaluations.description: Prove at least k of N evaluation completion flags are 1, without revealing results.

policy_checklist.description: Prove at least m of N policy checklist flags are 1, without revealing internal details.
